text: Beryllium hydroxide is a chemical compound with the chemical formula . It is the lightest amphoteric hydroxide, a type of chemical that can act as both an acid and a base. == Chemistry == Beryllium hydroxide is hard to dissolve in water, but will dissolve in both acidic and alkaline solutions. In acids, it reacts to make beryllium salts, and in bases, it forms a number of different anions known as beryllates. ==References== Category:Beryllium compounds Category:Amphoteric hydroxides
